QuestData.Title: Riding the Storm
QuestData.Description: Shan Bu, the leader of the Shan'ze, is performing some kind of dark ritual at the summit of the island to the northwest.$B$BWe believe that the subjugated Shan'ze Cloudrunners are powering the spell. How, we still do not know.$B$BWe believe that the Shan'ze Cloudrunners can still be saved from the corruption that taints them.$B$BTake these bronze claws. Use them to mount the back of a Shan'ze Cloudrunner.$B$BAttack them. Beat some sense back into their heads!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Bronze Claws to mount 8 Shan'ze Cloudrunners. Attack them to free them of their corruption.
